wikipedia_page.main: John Joseph Fallon (born August 1962) is a British businessman. He was the chief executive officer (CEO) of Pearson plc from 2013, succeeding Marjorie Scardino, until 2020. Pearson is one of the world's largest education brands.

response: In 2019, Pearson sold its US K-12 business to the private equity firm Nexus Capital Management. Pearson also sold its remaining 25% stake in Penguin Random House to Bertelsmann. Pearson CEO John Fallon retired from the company in 2020 and was succeeded by Andy Bird on 19 October 2020.
On October 3, 2012, it was announced that she will step down as CEO of Pearson to be replaced by John Fallon.
Bird was selected as CEO of Pearson plc to replace the retiring John Fallon and has been with the company since October 2020.
